thread.title: Gustavo W
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Gustavo W

author: Gustavo W
title: Gustavo W
text:
I got an excellent offer on a game that I wanted for a long time!
The navigation and the checkout process are easy to use and the order processing was extremely quick.
The only downside was that I didn't receive an email about the order had been finalized but as soon as I refresh the page the code was available and worked just fine on Steam.
